QuestData.Title: It's Our Problem Now
QuestData.Description: Looks like those monkeys will steal anything! Those thieving little monsters have driven the teraptor matriarch into a frenzy by stealing her eggs. Worse yet, the eggs have started to hatch! We've got hungry teraptor hatchlings running around all over the place, looking to make a quick meal out of us!$B$BWe didn't start this, but it's our problem now. You'll have to head into the jungle and kill those hungry teraptor hatchlings before they kill us all.
QuestData.CompletionText: What are you gonna do when Maxx Avalanche comes down on you, $n?! How's the hatchling hunting coming?
QuestData.RewardText: Let's just hope we don't have to deal with their mommy later. That would be very bad.
